name: views-test-rollup
description: Views (viewsdx.com), React, and rollup test app
author: Dar√≠o Javier Cravero <dario@uxtemple.com>

scripts.start: trap 'kill %1' SIGINT && rollup --watch --config rollup.config.js & static public --port 3000 --cache 0 -H '{"Cache-Control": "no-cache, must-revalidate"}'
